safire.data.corpus_dataset module¶

class safire.data.corpus_dataset.UnsupervisedCorpusDataset(mm_corpus_filename, dim, test_p=0.1, devel_p=0.1, serializer=<class 'gensim.corpora.mmcorpus.MmCorpus'>, try_loading=True, save_dataset=None, load_dataset=None, profile_loading=False)[source]¶

Bases: safire.data.unsupervised_dataset.UnsupervisedDataset

This dataset implements a memory-efficient way of feeding large corpora by batch. Only the requested batch is loaded into memory.

Internally keeps a reference to a gensim-style indexed corpus, which it uses to retrieve batches.

get_sparse(idx)[source]¶

Retrieves the given item in the sparse form from the source corpus.

iter_sparse(idx)[source]¶

Iterates through the corpus inside, yielding the sparse vectors.

n_devel_batches(batch_size)[source]¶

Determines how many batches of given size the training data will be split into.

Parameters:batch_size (int) – The intended size of one batch of the data.
Returns:The number of batches the training data will be split into for the given batch_size.
n_test_batches(batch_size)[source]¶

Determines how many batches of given size the training data will be split into.

Parameters:batch_size (int) – The intended size of one batch of the data.
Returns:The number of batches the training data will be split into for the given batch_size.
n_train_batches(batch_size)[source]¶

Determines how many batches of given size the training data will be split into.

Parameters:batch_size (int) – The intended size of one batch of the data.
Returns:The number of batches the training data will be split into for the given batch_size.
class safire.data.corpus_dataset.UnsupervisedImagenetCorpusDataset(mm_corpus_filename, ic_corpus_filename, dim=None, test_p=0.1, devel_p=0.1, serializer=<class 'gensim.corpora.mmcorpus.MmCorpus'>, try_loading=True, save_dataset=None, load_dataset=None, profile_loading=False)[source]¶

Bases: safire.data.corpus_dataset.UnsupervisedCorpusDataset

Adds ImgnetCorpus capabilities to UnsupervisedCorpusDataset: in addition to loading a MmCorpus-serialized corpus and making it available as a dataset, it will load an ImgnetCorpus used to build the MmCorpus-serialized data. The ImgnetCorpus is then made available as the icorp member of the object.

class safire.data.corpus_dataset.UnsupervisedVTextCorpusDataset(mm_corpus_filename, vt_corpus_filename, dim=None, test_p=0.1, devel_p=0.1, serializer=<class 'gensim.corpora.mmcorpus.MmCorpus'>, try_loading=True, save_dataset=None, load_dataset=None, profile_loading=False)[source]¶

Bases: safire.data.corpus_dataset.UnsupervisedCorpusDataset

Adds VTextCorpus capabilities to UnsupervisedCorpusDataset: in addition to loading a MmCorpus-serialized corpus and making it available as a dataset, it will load a VTextCorpus used to build the MmCorpus-serialized data. The VTextCorpus is then made available as the vtcorp member of the object.
